cause.description:
Located in the Colorado River Delta, the Vaquita has the smallest range of any marine mammal. It is on the brink of extinction and there are less than 500 left. 30-40 die each year in gill nets. More research and information in needed for management and illegal fishing with these gill nets needs to stop!
1. More research is needed
2. Need and alternative fishing method
3. Stop Illegal Fishing
cause.mission: to protect the most endangered marine mammal
cause.name: Save the Vaquita
